item.title: Test backup listing S3/NFS
item.description: 1. Backup listing with more than 1000 backups - S3 Deploy Longhorn on a kubernetes cluster. Set up S3 backupStore. Create a volume of 2Gi and attach it to a pod. Write some data into it and compute md5sum. Open browser developer tool. Create one backup by clicking LH GUI (It’ll call snapshotCreate and snapshotBackup APIs). Copy the snapshotBackup API call, right click Copy -> Copy as cURL. Run the curl command over 1k times in the Shell.

item.title: Uninstallation Checks
item.description: Prerequisites Have a setup of Longhorn installed on a kubernetes cluster. Have few volumes backups stored on S3/NFS backup store. Have one DR volume created (not activated) in another cluster with a volume in current cluster. Test steps Uninstall Longhorn. Check the logs of the job longhorn-uninstall, make sure there is no error. Check all the components of Longhorn from the namespace longhorn-system are uninstalled. E.g. Longhorn manager, Longhorn driver, Longhorn UI, instance manager, engine image, CSI driver etc.
